title: Motorcyclist stabbed to death during argument at fuel queue in Nittambuwa
body_lines: A 29-year old motorcyclist was stabbed to death by a three-wheeler driver following an argument at a fuel station in Horagolla, Nittambuwa last night, Police said.
They said a dispute between a motorcyclist and a three-wheeler driver who had come to get fuel at the Horagolla petrol station has led to the stabbing.
The driver of the three-wheeler was waiting outside the fuel station after pumping fuel for the motorcyclist who had got into an argument, stabbed the latter when he came after pumping petrol.
The victim was admitted to the Wathupitiwala Hospital and later succumbed to his injuries.
The Nittambuwa Police are conducting further investigations to arrest the suspect. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
